name: Type For Independence
description:
Story

Akashic records, the center of knowledge for humanity containing much recorded knowledge from the geniuses of each era, knowledge from anything trivial, to knowledge that could save the humanity. in the akashic records, only one person is given the authority to access all knowledge in there, it was to ensure so that the knowledge in there would not be used for evil. 

But one day the akashic records was attacked by someone claiming to be the enemy of humanity, their aim by destroying the akashic records was to erase all knowledge that humans have accumulated over the years so that this self-proclaimed enemy of humanity could destroy the human race easily. the librarian (the guy who have access to all the records) tried to stop this entity, but being the librarian, he never trained in battle. 

Nevertheless, he succeeded to push back the enemy so that the records only got scattered in multiple dimensions. even though he somewhat succeeded in defending the record, he despaired, as he doesn’t have the power to defeat the evil. there, he found, one grimoire that he never seen, said to give the wielder power to defeat evil just by saying the magic words. so he goes, on a journey, together with the mysterious grimoire to collect the records, and defeat the evil that threatened humanity.

How To Play?

1. Press W/A/S/D or use mouse for Camera Movement

2. Scroll mouse for Zoom in and Zoom out Camera

3. Press Any Key to Type

4. Press Space to Toggle Focus mode

Gameplay

1. Purchase Tower / Upgrade Tower

Build a Tower or upgrade it, to protect akashic records from the enemy of humanity.

2. Type To Attack

Protect your akashic records by typing correspond english word!

3. Learn English Word!

Every english word typed, correspond indonesian word will appear for learn! 

With Over Various Level, Unique Indonesian Culture Tower Design, Wonderful Environment and Challenging Enemy

We Dare you to try our game!
